messages.message:
Connection opportunity

Brian, 

I came across your profile and was very impressed with your experience as a Software Engineer at FanThreeSixty. I wanted to reach out and see if you were interested in hearing more about a role that I'm recruiting for If you are, get back to me and I would love to share more details.

Thank you,

JP Segura
510-717-8731

John Paul "JP" Segura (Invitations Welcome)
Is this an automatic message? I never worked at FanThreeSixty.

Not an automatic message. Just an oversight on my end. My apologies. Your background looks like it aligns well with a company I am supporting as an independent recruiter. While they are based out of Kansas City they would consider remote work options for the right candidate.

Would you be interested in reviewing the formal job announcement? If so please let me know and I can get it over to you. It is a direct position with a small company with a great culture and growth potential. 
Thank you,
JP
